data: Elsie Buchanan | Roderick Buchanan | George Buchanan

Elsie and Roderick Buchanan were the son and daughter, among a number of others, of the Rev. George Buchanan, a minister much esteemed in the city of St. Rule, and occupying a high place among the authorities and influential personages of that place.
The Unjust Steward; or, The Minister's Debt
